Class HdbOfficerController

Object
BaseController
HdbOfficerController
public class HdbOfficerController extends BaseController
This controller class handles and manages HDB Officer-specific workflows.

  • Method Details

    • registerForProjectTeam

      public ProjectRegistration registerForProjectTeam(HdbOfficer officer, String projectName)
      Allows an HDB Officer to register interest in managing a specific project. Performs eligibility checks. [cite: 18]
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDB Officer user.
      projectName - The name of the project to register for.
      Returns:
      The created ProjectRegistration object if successful, null otherwise.

    • viewMyRegistrations

      public List<ProjectRegistration> viewMyRegistrations(HdbOfficer officer)
      Retrieves registration requests submitted by the officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDB Officer.
      Returns:
      List of their registration requests.

    • viewHandledProjects

      public List<Project> viewHandledProjects(HdbOfficer officer)
      Gets details of projects the officer is *handling* (approved registration). Ignores visibility settings for these projects. [cite: 21]
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDB Officer.
      Returns:
      List of projects the officer is handling.

    • processFlatBooking

      public boolean processFlatBooking(HdbOfficer officer, ProjectApplication application, FlatType chosenFlatType)
      Simulates the flat selection process performed by an officer for a successful applicant. Updates application status, project unit counts. [cite: 23]
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDB Officer performing the action.
      application - The successful ProjectApplication.
      chosenFlatType - The FlatType chosen by the applicant.
      Returns:
      true if booking successful, false otherwise.

    • generateBookingReceipt

      public String generateBookingReceipt(HdbOfficer officer, ProjectApplication application)
      Generates receipt details for a booked application. [cite: 23] In a real app, this might format a string or return a dedicated Receipt object.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDB Officer.
      application - The booked ProjectApplication.
      Returns:
      A string containing receipt details, or null if invalid input/state.

    • getHandledEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> getHandledEnquiries(HdbOfficer officer)
      Gets enquiries for projects handled by the officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDB officer.
      Returns:
      List of relevant enquiries.

    • replyToEnquiry

      public boolean replyToEnquiry(HdbOfficer officer, String enquiryId, String replyContent)
      Allows an officer to reply to an enquiry for a project they handle.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDB Officer replying.
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to reply to.
      replyContent - The content of the reply.
      Returns:
      true if reply was successful, false otherwise.
